TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerOptionService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerOptionService
Public MustInherit Class DesignerOptionService Implements IDesignerOptionService

summary.span: 提供基底類別，用於取得和設定設計工具的選項值。

span.span: Provides a base class for getting and setting option values for a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的選項集合。The class provides a collection of options. 這些選項集合的每個已索引子，讓它能夠進一步篩選。Each of these option collections has an indexer that enables it to be further filtered. 每個選項的集合包含它自己一組選項，以及彙總所有它的子選項。Each option collection contains its own set of options, as well as a rollup of all of its child options. 在發生命名衝突的屬性之間，最外層的選項物件會優先使用。In the event of a naming conflict between properties, the outermost options object takes precedence. 下列**工具|選項**使用者介面 (UI) 的結構會顯示最外層的選項物件如何採用更高的重要性：The following **Tools | Options** user interface (UI) structure shows how the outermost options object takes on greater importance: **WindowsFormsDesigner|一般****WindowsFormsDesigner | General** - **貼齊格線****SnapToGrid** - **ShowGrid****ShowGrid** - **GridSize****GridSize** 給定名為`service`，以取得的值屬性，則會進行下列呼叫：Given a named `service`, to get to the value of the property, you would make the following call: [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#2)] 其運作，直到您想要移動到另一個頁面。This works, until you want to move to another page. 此外，不提供任何探索機制。Also, provides no discovery mechanism. 如果您不知道什麼要傳入的字串，會將屬性值找不到服務。If you do not know what string to pass in, the service cannot find the property value. 類別會處理這些問題。The class addresses these issues. 您可以查詢集合，且沒有上定義的型別轉換子標示為可展開集合的物件。You can query collections, and there is a type converter defined on the object that marks the collection as expandable. 使用此型別轉換子，您可以將整個設計工具選項的服務傳遞至屬性視窗，並以視覺化方式檢查服務。With this type converter, you can pass the entire designer option service to a property window and visually inspect the service. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何存取顯示標準的選項的目前值。The following code example demonstrates accessing the to display the current values of the standard options. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/CS/designeroptionservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/VB/designeroptionservicecontrol.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`參數指定用於其公用屬性的物件選項集合的集合。The `value` parameter specifies an object whose public properties are used in the collection of the option collection. `value`參數可以是`null`如果這個選項的集合不提供任何屬性。The `value` parameter can be `null` if this options collection does not offer any properties. 屬性會包裝在這種方式，將任何傳入的元件參數會被忽略，而`value`物件用來替代。Properties are wrapped in such a way that passing anything into the component parameter of the is ignored, and the `value` object is substituted.

span.span: or is .
is an empty string.

summary.span: 取得這個服務的選項集合。

span.span: Gets the options collection for this service.

value.span: 用可用的設計工具選項填入 。

span.span: A populated with available designer options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一定會包含子集合的全域選項集合。There is always a global options collection that contains child collections. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示如何您可以瀏覽集合命名的索引子，您可以取得的值`GridSize`選項。The following code example shows how you can navigate the collections by named indexers so you can get the value of the `GridSize` option. 所有的三種類型會傳回相同的值。All three variations return the same value. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/CS/designeroptionservicecontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/VB/designeroptionservicecontrol.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依第一次使用者要求的子選項或選項集合的屬性上呼叫方法。The method is called on demand the first time a user asks for child options or properties of an options collection. 您可以填入`options`藉由呼叫集合方法並傳遞做為父系的這個集合。You can populate the `options` collection by calling the method and passing this collection as the parent.
